Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: I hope this focuses the team on the wallets for a moment.  Last night they were saying, "Quick, transfer to Ocean wallet!"  So I downloaded that and it was taking forever to sync, i didnt have enough space on my SSD and the Ocean wallet is plastered with disclaimers about how it is Beta and funds are not Safu in it.  So the team was recommending a beta version wallet as a safe haven for funds that were compromised out of their other beta version wallet.

Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: right right

Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: but the idea was, "Take your funds out of our beta wallet that was compromised and create a new wallet that has disclaimers about how your funds are not safu and put your funds in the new non-safu wallet"
